title: MINI TACO CUPS
directions: Cook hamburger until almost done, then add undrained can of Ro*Tel Original Diced Tomatoes & Green Chilies, continue cooking until hamburger is completely cooked with no pink showing, drain
Return to pan, sprinkle taco seasoning and add water
Place chips on cookie sheet or mini muffin pan
Using a small spatula or butter knife, spread a small amount of beans into each chip
Add a spoonful of taco meat
Bake at 350 degrees for about 10 minutes or until cheese is completely melted.
Top with Sour Cream, Green Onions, Cilantro or other toppings you like.
ingredients: 1 (10 oz) can Ro*Tel Original Diced Tomatoes & Green Chilies
